summary: this is a copy of some mods i made as a personal set....it\'s also my first mod
descriptionHtml:
THIS IS MY FIRST MOD!

*all items are ridiculously overpowered so if you don\'t like that, that\'s fine*

contained within is the following:

Uber Daedric Armor: gauntlets, cuirass, boots, helmet, sheild

OP Daedric Sword: self explanatory

BEST WEAPON EVER: a shiv with ridiculous stats

__________________________________________________________

TO FIND

1. open the console command system ( the   `   or   ~ button on the keyboard located next to the 1 key)

2. (type) help

3. then either OP, BEST WEAPON EVER, or Uber

4. find the item I.D. ( the number in ()  next to the name )

5. (type) player.add item (item id) (quantity)

so in other words (item id is represented by \'xxx\' and quantity by \'y\'

player.additem xxx y

this will add the item to your inventory
author: MittensFTW
